text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.title: Realistic Sleep mod config
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.da: The message that will be displayed to all players on the action bar after sleeping through the night.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.sl: How many times faster the night should go.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.bl: How many times faster block entities like furnaces should tick.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.ch: How many times faster chunks should tick.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.ra: How many times faster raid timers should tick .
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.en: How many times faster entities should tick.
